name: gaskunk
description: TypeScript Friendly ORM for Google Apps Script + Google Sheets(Spreadsheets) as Database

scripts.postinstall: npx replace-in-file "declare var console" "//declare var console" node_modules/@types/google-apps-script/google-apps-script.base.d.ts
